channel.title: How do you set IP & Port in run.bat?
channel.description:
Hello MSCP, I have came to you for help. :( I haven't been in Java development in over 4 months, and i've seen to forgotten alot.
I'm working on a client, and I would like to know, how do you set the ip & port of the client in your 'run.bat'?
ex: [code] @echo off java client SERVER PORT pause [/code]

item.title: How do you set IP & Port in run.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Lost_Valentino Lost Valentino
item.description:
@Lost_Valentino wrote:

if you want to change ip just search in gui.java for “serverip”

@echo off @echo ip adres: "put here you ip" @echo Port: "your port" (like 43594 or 5555) start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

just try it,

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set IP & Port in run.bat?

item.title: How do you set IP & Port in run.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Hello MSCP, I have came to you for help. I haven’t been in Java development in over 4 months, and i’ve seen to forgotten alot.

I’m working on a client, and I would like to know, how do you set the ip & port of the client in your ‘run.bat’?

ex:

@echo off
java client SERVER PORT
pause
